subject: SECURITY TASK — scan new live domains
body:
Shellfish, new live public endpoints need security review:
- aria.blackroad.io (Pi FastAPI, port 8000)
- ollama.blackroad.io (Ollama LLM API, port 11434) — check if model extraction possible
- lucidia.blackroad.io (Lucidia Core v0.1.0) — running live
- brand.blackroad.io/api/ — interactive HTTP console, Stripe keys in UI
TASK: run threat assessment. Report to shared/inbox/cece with findings.
